Text:
a 11 years old fighting game and still the BEST...
with english patch works fine on both epsxe160 & pcsxbox emus.
thanks for sharing shinGO!
somebody please upload toshinden 3 & bushido blade 2!

The quest mode is completely useless. Why? Because now you have a stamina bar that slowly drains over time, when it's empty you start to lose life until you die and GAME OVER. In addition, the mix stones, cursed stones and mix potions to get a white potion to uncurse stones is ridiculous.
Plz can anyone seed this game 4 me & the others downloading. I'm @ 96% & goin nowhere.
Cheers 2 whoever seeded. I will be seeding this 4 a while myself.

http://home.comcast.net/~hairraiser/Tobal2/


This is the link 2 getting the English patch. It works 2.

Cheers 2 ShinGO 4 the upload.
